name: latiasite
effect: Held: Allows Latias to Mega Evolve into Mega Latias.
short_effect: Held: Allows Latias to Mega Evolve into Mega Latias.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Latias hold it, and this stone will enable it to
Mega Evolve during battle.
